attributes.action: Award EMA's for all students studying post 16 courses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present EMA's are means tested therefore only students from low income families recive a full EMA. I request that every post 16 student is given an EMA no matter what the family income is.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Award EMA's for all students studying post 16 courses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18495


Prime Minister's Office
